product_name: Life is good Softwash Zippity Hoodie - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Princess seams give a flattering, feminine fit to the easy-going Life is good(R) Softwash Zippity hoodie. Soft cotton/polyester fleece fabric is warm, soft and breathable. Drawcord hood; on-seam pockets; rib-knit cuffs and hem. Closeout.
short_description: Princess seams give a flattering, feminine fit to the easy-going Life is good(R) Softwash Zippity hoodie.
